Operation 'post-/crm/v3/imports/{importId}/cancel_cancel' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. data.current_description: This allows a developer to cancel an active import.
data.description_suggestion: Cancels an active import operation for the specified import ID. The import must be in an active state to be cancelled. Returns an ActionResponse confirming the cancellation. After cancellation, the import will stop processing and no further rows will be imported.
data.reasoning: Current description is too generic and lacks important details. Added clarity about the import state requirement, explicit return type (ActionResponse), and side effects (import stops processing). This helps AI agents understand the operation's constraints and effects.

data.current_summary: Get the information on any import
data.current_description: A complete summary of an import record, including any updates.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information about a specific import by its ID. Returns a PublicImportResponse object containing the import's metadata, status, configuration, and any associated errors or warnings. Includes all updates and current state of the import operation.

message: Operation 'get-/crm/v3/imports/_getPage' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Description lacks specificity about return type and pagination mechanism. Added explicit return schema (CollectionResponsePublicImportResponse), clarified pagination parameters, and specified that only active imports are returned. This helps AI agents understand filtering behavior and response structure.

data.current_description: Returns a paged list of active imports for this account.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of active imports for the current account. Returns a CollectionResponsePublicImportResponse containing PublicImportResponse objects for each import. Supports pagination through limit and offset parameters. Only includes imports with active status; completed or cancelled imports are excluded.
data.reasoning: Description lacks specificity about return type and pagination mechanism. Added explicit return schema (CollectionResponsePublicImportResponse), clarified pagination parameters, and specified that only active imports are returned. This helps AI agents understand filtering behavior and response structure.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/imports/_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Added specifics about what the import request must contain (object type, column mappings), explicit return type (PublicImportResponse), and critical context that imports are asynchronous. data.current_description: Begins importing data from the specified file resources. This uploads the corresponding file and uses the import request object to convert rows in the files to objects.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a new import operation by uploading file resources and converting rows to CRM objects. Accepts an import request object specifying the file resources, object type, and column mappings. Returns a PublicImportResponse with the import ID and initial status. The import processes asynchronously; use the import ID to track progress and retrieve errors.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about input requirements and return value. Added specifics about what the import request must contain (object type, column mappings), explicit return type (PublicImportResponse), and critical context that imports are asynchronous. This enables AI agents to understand how to construct requests and track results.

Returns a CollectionResponsePublicImportResponse containing PublicImportResponse objects for each import. Supports pagination through limit and offset parameters. Only includes imports with active status; completed or cancelled imports are excluded.
data.reasoning: Description lacks specificity about return type and pagination mechanism. Added explicit return schema (CollectionResponsePublicImportResponse), clarified pagination parameters, and specified that only active imports are returned. This helps AI agents understand filtering behavior and how to navigate results.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/imports/_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Current description doesn't explain the asynchronous nature or return value. Added clarity that operation returns PublicImportResponse with import ID, explained asynchronous processing model, and noted that polling is required for status. This helps AI agents understand they need to track the import separately and not expect immediate completion.

data.current_description: Begins importing data from the specified file resources. This uploads the corresponding file and uses the import request object to convert rows in the files to objects.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a new import operation by uploading file resources and converting rows to CRM objects based on the import configuration. Returns a PublicImportResponse containing the import ID and initial status. The import runs asynchronously; use the import ID to poll for completion status and retrieve errors. File data is validated and queued for processing.
data.reasoning: Current description doesn't explain the asynchronous nature or return value. Added clarity that operation returns PublicImportResponse with import ID, explained asynchronous processing model, and noted that polling is required for status. This helps AI agents understand they need to track the import separately and not expect immediate completion.
